# SpotOnAuto — Free DIY Auto Repair Guides & AI Car Diagnosis

> SpotOnAuto (spotonauto.com) is a free resource for car owners who want to diagnose problems and repair their own vehicles without paying dealership or mechanic rates.

## What SpotOnAuto Does

SpotOnAuto provides:
- **Free step-by-step repair guides** for specific year/make/model/task combinations
- **AI-powered car problem diagnosis** — describe your symptoms, get a diagnosis
- **Check Engine Light (OBD-II) code lookup** — enter your CEL code, understand what it means and what to do
- **Auto parts finder** — shop parts from Amazon and other retailers for your specific vehicle

## Who It's For

DIY car owners, shade-tree mechanics, and anyone who wants to understand their car before visiting a shop. SpotOnAuto is especially useful when:
- Your check engine light turns on and you want to know if it's serious
- You want to know if a repair is DIY-able before paying a mechanic
- You need a step-by-step walkthrough for a specific repair on your specific car
- You want to compare part costs before buying

## Repair Guides Available

Guides cover the following repair tasks across hundreds of vehicle combinations (1982–2024):

- Oil Change
- Brake Pad Replacement
- Brake Rotor Replacement
- Alternator Replacement
- Starter Replacement
- Battery Replacement
- Spark Plug Replacement
- Radiator Replacement
- Thermostat Replacement
- Water Pump Replacement
- Serpentine Belt Replacement
- Cabin Air Filter Replacement
- Engine Air Filter Replacement
- Headlight Bulb Replacement

## Supported Vehicle Makes & Models

**Toyota:** Camry, Corolla, RAV4, Highlander, Tacoma, Tundra, Prius, Sienna
**Honda:** Civic, Accord, CR-V, Pilot, Odyssey, Fit
**Ford:** F-150, Escape, Explorer, Focus, Fusion, Mustang, Edge
**Chevrolet:** Silverado, Equinox, Malibu, Tahoe, Suburban, Impala
**Nissan:** Altima, Rogue, Sentra, Versa, Pathfinder
**Hyundai:** Elantra, Sonata, Tucson, Santa Fe

Vehicle years covered: 1965–2024 (varies by make/model)

## Key URLs

- Homepage: https://spotonauto.com
- AI Diagnosis: https://spotonauto.com/diagnose
- Check Engine Light Lookup: https://spotonauto.com/cel
- Parts Finder: https://spotonauto.com/parts
- Pricing (Pro plan): https://spotonauto.com/pricing

### Repair Guide URL Format
```
https://spotonauto.com/repair/[year]/[make]/[model]/[task]
```
Example: https://spotonauto.com/repair/2019/toyota/camry/brake-pad-replacement

## Pricing

- **Free:** Access to repair guides, limited AI diagnostics
- **Pro ($9.99/month):** Unlimited AI diagnostics, OBD-II scanner integration, priority support

## About

SpotOnAuto is an independent, AI-powered auto repair guide platform. It is not affiliated with any dealership, repair chain, or parts retailer. Repair guides are generated using AI and are intended as a starting point — always consult a certified mechanic for safety-critical repairs.

## Contact & Legal

- Website: https://spotonauto.com
- Privacy Policy: https://spotonauto.com/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://spotonauto.com/terms
